hubris:Icosahedron.NAME: Runic Icosahedron
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, you may roll the Icosahedron.
NL You may no longer roll the Icosahedron.
Gain [R] at the start of each turn.
Gain [G] at the start of each turn.
Gain [B] at the start of each turn.

hubris:Black Hole.NAME: Black Hole
DESCRIPTIONS: All cards cost #b0. NL Any card entering your discard pile is exhausted.

DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer see the entire map.
Gain [R] at the start of each turn.
Gain [G] at the start of each turn.
Gain [B] at the start of each turn.

hubris:Metronome.NAME: Metronome
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases #yStrength for each sequential #yAttack played. Playing a #yNon-Attack card resets the bonus to #b0.
